desc: Loose leaf herbal teas / tisanes and other herbal products. Excellent products that speak heart and soul to the herbalist in you: Harmony Blend (formerly Red Clover Blend), Teapots, French Presses, Essential Oils, Purify Skin Therapy herbal salves, Mega-K Krill Oil, Authentic Colloidal Silver. Education & videos.

layout.text: Experience a smooth, rich, delightful symphony of six dynamic herbs synergistically harmonizing the body that tantalizes the pickiest of taste buds!
